data.text: @SBAIsabel @SBAgov I wonder how the discrimination lawsuit is going against the SBA for the discrimination in the RRF program

@Jennife42638265 @SBAIsabel @SBAgov Agreed.  Congress doesn’t want to replenish the RRF because so much money is going to Ukraine we need to get the states to replenish the RRF Covid money is just sitting in bank accounts billions of dollars

@SBAIsabel @SBAgov the states should replenish the RRF they have lots of funds they haven’t used from Covid that is taxpayer money and can be used to help small businesses we just need somebody to carry the torch I heard Congress doesn’t want to replenish the RRF the money is going to Ukraine
@SBAIsabel @SBAgov We would if been able to eso and to lunch and weekends and open back 7 nights a week for dinner had our #RRF grant not been rescinded by you!

@SBAIsabel @SBAgov See what helping does?⬆️now there are 177,000 with a different experience theirs includes, sleepless nights, stress, loss of personal assets and savings, loss of employees, higher food costs we can’t afford and soon bankruptcy. #ReplenishRRF
@LinJack82752118 I advice you send direct messages to her on Telegram @SBAisabel she will help you out okay!!
@SBAIsabel @SBAgov Probably one of the winners of the rrf grant sad government in the business of choosing who gets to succeed and who doesn’t!

@SBAIsabel @SBAgov Please look at the thread of tweets I have been pleading for help for my business for two years now from multiple offices within the SBA. I have tired myself and expended my resources trying while your agents mishandle my file
@SBAIsabel @SBAgov Ms Guzman, I've filed FBI report involving Jason McElhone.
